trans-unit.source: Represents a component that is used to authorize users.
trans-unit.target: Representerer en komponent som brukes til å godkjenne brukere.

trans-unit.source: Authorization policies and authorization contexts, which implement the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy> interface and derive from the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> class, respectively, implement the IAuthorizationComponent interface.
trans-unit.target: Policyer for godkjenning og autorisasjon kontekster, noe som implementerer den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>grensesnittet og avledes fra de <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext>klasse henholdsvis implementere grensesnittet IAuthorizationComponent.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.AuthorizationContext> </xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationPolicy>

trans-unit.source: The IAuthorizationComponent interface defines a unique identifier for authorization components with the <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationComponent.Id%2A> property, which is generally used for auditing.
trans-unit.target: Grensesnittet IAuthorizationComponent definerer en unik identifikator for godkjenning komponenter med den <xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationComponent.Id%2A>egenskapen, som vanligvis brukes for overvåking.</xref:System.IdentityModel.Policy.IAuthorizationComponent.Id%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets a string that identifies this authorization component.
trans-unit.target: Henter en streng som identifiserer denne authorization-komponenten.

trans-unit.source: The value of the Id property must be unique for all objects in the Identity Model.
trans-unit.target: Verdien for Id-egenskapen må være unikt for alle objektene i modellen identitet.

trans-unit.source: A string that identifies this authorization component.
trans-unit.target: En streng som identifiserer denne authorization-komponenten.
